content: My business operates in the e-commerce niche, and I offer handmade home decor products. My ideal customer is a female between 25-45 years old who values unique, eco-friendly products. The goal of my previous campaign was to drive website traffic and increase brand awareness. My ad content was a high-quality image of one of my products with a brief description and a call-to-action to visit my website. The budget for my previous campaign was around $100, and the results were 50 clicks to my website, which I'm pretty happy with.
